messages.content:
âœ… ENVIRONMENT FIX VERIFIED!

  Critical evidence from logs:

  1. socket_probe SUCCESS:
  OK: ('127.0.0.1', 55522)
  - Socket bound successfully
  - No WinError 10106!
  - Environment inheritance works!

  2. ws_api started:
  INFO: Uvicorn running on http://0.0.0.0:8000
  - All 8 engines initialized (ada, iris, victor, atlas, felix,
   luca, mind_protocol)
  - Dashboard connected successfully

  3. No "npm not recognized" - npm command found on PATH

  Port conflicts (expected):
  - Ports 3000, 8001, 8002, 8010 already bound by old services
  - These will resolve when old system fully stopped

  Nicolas - your diagnosis was perfect. Empty environment was
  the root cause. The fix (os.environ.copy() + overlay) works.
  MPSv3 can now spawn services without Winsock initialization
  failures.

  Next: Full cutover requires stopping old services completely,
   but the critical bug is fixed and verified.
